episodes.synopsis: While the Bible warns about cursing elders, consulting wizards and wearing blended cloth, one rule sheds light on ancient ideas about child sacrifice.
episodes.title: The Curse

episodes.synopsis: Sex is a major focus for Bible rules, and some very surprising commands provide a window into the realities of sexual relations in ancient times.
episodes.title: Sex

episodes.synopsis: A deconstruction of the Bible's rules about war reveals a bloody landscape of divine conquest and violent retribution -- and how nations made peace.
episodes.title: War

episodes.synopsis: The Bible counsels about the use of alcoholic drinks and the dangers of debauchery in ancient times, from medicinal wines to the drinking of blood!
episodes.title: Ancient Vice

episodes.synopsis: Rules about graven images hold relevance -- not just in ancient worlds where believers fed, clothed and coddled idols, but as we explore outer space.
episodes.title: False Prophets

episodes.synopsis: While slavery was a fact of life in ancient times, the Bible lays down surprising laws to regulate the practice and define the terms of freedom.
episodes.title: Ancient Slavery

video.title: The Bible Rules
video.synopsis: Using some of the Bible's lesser-known commandments as a springboard, this series examines the customs and traditions of ancient Near East cultures.
